content: This area has its own Crow Diviner, and while not as durable as the one who dropped the Spirit, he can still employ their new Cloud Step-like abilities to turn almost invisible and attack with chilling force.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Towers of Karma'.
The content is as follows:
This area has its own Crow Diviner, and while not as durable as the one who dropped the Spirit, he can still employ their new Cloud Step-like abilities to turn almost invisible and attack with chilling force.
